name: Light My Fire Spork n Straw Kit Titanium
description:
Sip and snack with the ultimate combo: the spork and straw. Ultralight titanium withstands the rigours of the backcountry and won't weigh down your pack or picnic basket.Made of strong titanium that won't melt or break, and has no taste.Serrated fork edge helps cut through food like a knife.Dishwasher safe.Includes recycled merino wool carry case.

        Sustainability
